title: Google\Cloud\Spanner\V1\ResultSetMetadata
name: ResultSetMetadata
description:
Metadata about a [ResultSet][google.spanner.v1.ResultSet] or [PartialResultSet][google.spanner.v1.PartialResultSet].

Generated from protobuf message google.spanner.v1.ResultSetMetadata

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getRowType
methods.description:
Indicates the field names and types for the rows in the result set. For example, a SQL query like "SELECT UserId, UserName FROM Users" could return a row_type value like: "fields": [ { "name": "UserId", "type": { "code": "INT64" } }, { "name": "UserName", "type": { "code": "STRING" } }, ]

Generated from protobuf field .google.spanner.v1.StructType row_type = 1;

methods.name: setRowType
methods.description:
Indicates the field names and types for the rows in the result set. For example, a SQL query like "SELECT UserId, UserName FROM Users" could return a row_type value like: "fields": [ { "name": "UserId", "type": { "code": "INT64" } }, { "name": "UserName", "type": { "code": "STRING" } }, ]

Generated from protobuf field .google.spanner.v1.StructType row_type = 1;

params.name: var
params.description: Indicates the field names and types for the rows in the result set. methods.name: getTransaction
methods.description:
If the read or SQL query began a transaction as a side-effect, the information about the new transaction is yielded here.

Generated from protobuf field .google.spanner.v1.Transaction transaction = 2;
